metrics.name: No-Touch-Order Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of “perfect orders” or no-touch orders, i.e. delivered on time, with the right amount and no other changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE (
	SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${processing_completion_events})
		AND (${ontime_delivery_condition})
		AND NOT event_name IN (${otc_change_events}))
	)
)/COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Return order items created
metrics.description: Number of return order items that were created within a time period

metrics.name: On-time delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of deliveries arriving at their destination before or on the expected date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${ontime_delivery_condition})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')))
	) 
* 100

metrics.name: Return order items created
metrics.description: Number of return order items that were created within a time period

metrics.name: Total number of sales orders
metrics.description: Total amount of orders on header level

metrics.name: Return rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in which an item was returned
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE event_name IN (${return_order_events})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue and open Accounts Receivable items
metrics.description: Number of overdue open customer items
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${invoice_overdue_condition} OR ${open_accounts_receivable_condition})) > 0
	)

metrics.name: Rejected sales document items
metrics.description: Number of rejected sales order items that were created within a time period

metrics.name: Average invoice customer process time
metrics.description: Average time from the posting of goods issue to the creation of an invoice item
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${billing_creation_events}))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${shipping_events}))
)

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.description: Average number of days that it takes a company to collect payment after a sale
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${billing_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${billing_creation_events}))
	)

metrics.name: Lead time: invoice creation to accounts receivable clearing
metrics.description: Average lead time for items that were cleared within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST("InvoiceAccountingClearingDate") WHERE 
		((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(${invoice_reference_date})WHERE 
		((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Automation rate: sales document creation
metrics.description: Percentage of automated sales order creation events within a time period
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (
		(SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN (${sales_order_doc_creation_events})
		 AND (${otc_automation_condition}))
		 AND ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${sales_order_doc_creation_period})) 
	)
) / SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name)))
* 100

metrics.name: Average processing time for sales orders
metrics.description: Average time from the creation of a sales order item to its complete processing
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${processing_completion_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${sales_order_item_creation_events}))
	)

metrics.name: Dunning rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice is dunned

metrics.name: Deleted sales document items
metrics.description: Number of deleted items in sales documents within a defined period of time

metrics.name: No payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice is overdue and not cleared
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE ((${invoice_overdue_condition})
			AND (${no_payment_condition}))) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Lead time: sales document item creation to delivery creation
metrics.description: Average lead time from the event 'Create Sales Order Item' to the event 'Create Delivery Order Item'

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the invoice was cleared after its due date
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (${invoice_overdue_condition})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR(event_name IN ('Clear Invoice')))
	) 
* 100

metricVariables.name: dunning_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL

metricVariables.name: open_accounts_receivable_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has not been cleared so far, although it was expected to. For example: NOW() > "InvoiceDueDate"

metricVariables.name: billing_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoice items, for example 'Create Invoice Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_posting_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoices that have been paid, for example, for payments that have been paid at least 1 day ago: '1days'

metricVariables.name: ontime_delivery_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that a delivery is on time, for example "DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime" = 'Yes'

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor cleared invoices, for example, for invoices that were cleared during last week: '7days'

metricVariables.name: shipping_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: outbound_delivery_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that an Outbound Delivery Item has been created, for example: 'Create Outbound Delivery Item'

metricVariables.name: otc_change_events
metricVariables.description: Events referring to changes made to the sales doc item, for example: 'Change Sales Doc Item Price'
metricVariables.value: 'Change Sales Doc Item Price',  'Change Sales Doc Item Material',  'Change Sales Doc Item Plant', 'Change Sales Doc Item Quantity', 'Change Sales Doc Item Route', 'Change Sales Doc Item Delivery Amount'

metricVariables.name: outbound_delivery_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period in which outbound deliveries have been created, counting backward from today, for example: '7days'

metricVariables.name: invoice_reference_date
metricVariables.description: Attributes identifying which field of the accounting document is used for the calculation of the lead time, for example: "InvoiceAccountingDocumentDate"

metricVariables.name: processing_completion_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying when a sales order is processed, for example 'Sales Order Completely Processed'

metricVariables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"

metricVariables.name: billing_clearing_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that an invoice was cleared, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: sales_order_item_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of a sales order, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

metricVariables.name: sales_order_item_deletion_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were deleted, for example, for sales order items that were deleted during last week: '7days'

metricVariables.name: sales_order_doc_creation_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order documents that were created, for example, for sales order documents that were created during last week: '7days'

metricVariables.name: otc_automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example: "EventCreatedByUserType" != 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: sales_order_doc_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events referring to the creation of any sales document, for example: 'Create Sales Order Item', 'Create Contract Item'
metricVariables.value: 'Create Sales Order Item', 'Create Contract Item', 'Create Return Sales Order Item', 'Create Sales Order Item w/o Charge', 'Create Credit Memo Request Item', 'Create Debit Memo Request Item'

metricVariables.name: sales_order_item_creation_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were created, for example, for sales order items that were created during last week: '7days'

metricVariables.name: no_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was not cleared, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL

metricVariables.name: delete_sales_order_item_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that a sales order item was deleted, for example: 'Delete Sales Doc Item'

metricVariables.name: return_order_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that a sales order was returned, for example 'Create Return Sales Order Item'
metricVariables.value: 'Create Return Sales Order Item','Create Returns Delivery'

metricVariables.name: returned_orders_reference_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were returned, for example, for sales order items that were returned during last week: '7days'

metricVariables.name: rejected_orders_reference_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor sales order items that were rejected, for example, for sales order items that were rejected during last week: '7days'
